snippet: While games like Angry Birds may seem to have little to do with physics, many make use of the laws of motion, materials science and gravity.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column compares mobile games that are based on physics; recommends rebooted Lift app that is now called Coach.Me.
lead_paragraph: While games like Angry Birds may seem to have little to do with physics, many make use of the laws of motion, materials science and gravity.

headline.print_headline: Games Played by the Laws of Physics (Though Bent a Little in Some Cases)
headline.main: Games Played by the Laws of Physics (Though Bent a Little in Some Cases)
